titles.title: Calling on the President and the Secretary of Education to fire Kevin Jennings from his post as "Safe Schools Czar".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 12/11/2009--Introduced. Expresses the House of Representatives' belief that it is reprehensible for a Safe Schools Czar to promote sex between adults and children and that those who hold such post should not promote criminal behavior. Calls on the President and the Secretary of Education to find an immediate replacement for Kevin Jennings, the current Safe Schools Czar.
